meanings.definition: A small insect typically living in a complex social colony.
meanings.sent1: The ant carried a leaf many times its size back to the anthill.
meanings.sent2: I watched the ant crawl along the ground in search of food.
meanings.sent3: The ant decided to throw a party in its anthill for all its insect friends.
meanings.sent4: The ant's teamwork in building the anthill was like a bustling city coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The ant's ability to communicate with its colony members amazed the scientist.

meanings.definition: A person who is diligent, industrious, and hardworking.
meanings.sent1: My coworker is an ant, always the first to arrive and last to leave.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the office ant for her dedication and work ethic.
meanings.sent3: The ant in our group project made sure everything was perfect before the deadline.
meanings.sent4: His work ethic is like that of an ant, never stopping until the job is done.
meanings.sent5: Being an ant in her studies, she never missed a class or assignment.
